name: Paul Stulac - Red Screaming Sun - Robusto
additionalNotes: The cigars of Paul Stulac are true masterpieces of tobacco craftsmanship, elaborated with care and dedication in Las Villas, Nicaragua, by the master blender Guillermo Pena. The selection of long filling tobaccos of the highest quality in Nicaragua and other regions of the world guarantees an exceptionally rich and complex smoking experience. The reputation of the Paul Stulac line of cigars has been earned thanks to its impeccable construction and its captivating flavors that will delight even the most demanding smokers. If you are looking for a sophisticated and nuanced smoking experience, the Paul Stulac cigars are an excellent choice to satisfy your senses and enjoy unforgettable moments.
